title: BBC Local Live: Stoke & Staffordshire on Thursday 8 October 2015 - BBC News
summary: hotline set up after toxic chemical found at stafford school .
stoke-on-trent terror court case heads to old bailey .
thousands of people sign hearing aid petition in staffordshire .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for staffordshire and cheshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back from 08:00 friday with the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: weather : forecast for tonight and tomorrow
text: clear sky again tonight which will see the temperatures fall to around 8c ( 46f ) with potential for mist and fog .
then tomorrow , another dry and sunny day with plenty of sunshine and some cloud building .
highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: Shefali Oza
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: children nauseous at formaldehyde school
text: several children at a stafford primary school where formaldehyde 's been found have suffered sore eyes , noses and throats and been nauseous , the headteacher 's said .
simon barker , the head of flash ley primary school , says they 've suffered symptoms `` consistent with smelling '' the chemical .
it 's thought the cause is linked to work carried out at the site over the summer - the county council 's set up a dedicated helpline for concerned parents on 0300 111 8050
find out more on midlands today from 18:30 on bbc one .
there is a low risk of long term health effects , it 's a short term impact - once we 're out of that situation their health should improve rapidly
author: Jennie Aitken
Reporter, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: leek cattle market set to expand
text: leek livestock marketis set to expanddue to a continuing increase in trade from farmers across the country .
author: Leek Post and Times

documents.title: stafford 'mystery smell ' school : what is formaldehyde ?
text: formaldehyde , which has been found at flash ley primary school , is a toxic cancer-causing compound often used as a disinfectant and for embalming .
public health england describe it as a `` possible carcinogen , toxic and corrosive '' and say it can irritate the skin and cause breathing and digestive problems .
they say it 's a colourless , corrosive , flammable gas with a pungent , suffocating odour , which is produced in large quantities industrially .

staffordshire county council say the chemical is commonly used `` in buildings , internal furnishings and household products '' and in the case of flash ley is thought to be connected to flooring work over the summer .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football : injured loanee reports back for duty
text: winger zeli ismailhas finally returned to trainingwith burton albion .
the 21-year-old , who 's on loan from wolves , suffered a knee injury in pre-season and has been struggling to regain his fitness since .
ismail is in contention for saturday 's trip to walsall but wo n't be rushed back by manager jimmy floyd hasselbaink .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Sport

documents.title: news : toxic chemical found at school and hearing aid petition handed over
text: the top stories for staffordshire and cheshire :
- long lasting health problems for pupils of a stafford school where the chemical formaldehyde 's been found are `` unlikely '' , says the county council
- a stoke-on-trent man is due before the old bailey at the end of the month accused of terror offences
- a charity fighting cuts to nhs hearing aids in staffordshire has handed a petition of over 5,000 signatures to the county council
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: here 's the front page of today 's tamworth herald
text: the family of a boy who died from meningitis are urging parents to get their children vaccinated against the deadly infection .
author: Tamworth Herald

documents.title: long term health issues for school pupils 'unlikely ' after toxic chemical discovery
text: long lasting health problems for pupils of a stafford school where the chemical formaldehyde 's been found are `` unlikely '' , says the county council .

staffordshire county council say the toxic compound , that in some circumstances can cause cancer , was discovered at flash ley community primary school and nursery after an investigation into a `` mystery '' smell .
i want to assure everyone that we are investigating this incident and are taking all available steps to ensure there is no risk to staff or pupils .
author: Terry Goodwin
News Editor, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: your birds queue up for a car ride around lake
text: they 're eager - these geese were snapped by mark cooper who says they were `` queuing for a drive round west port lake '' .
mark tweeted his to me - you can do the same to @ twitterid or drop me one if you agree to share it on email , and i 'll feature as many as i can .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: meaford business park roadworks to hit newcastle road
text: part of newcastle road in stone will be closed for two months to allow utility works for the new development at meaford business park .
author: A Little Bit Of Stone

documents.title: on-air : special birthday message from jason donovan
text: it 's bbc radio stoke breakfast presenter charlotte foster 's birthday today and she 's a big fan of jason donovan - so we lined up this special message for her :
i think charlotte liked it !
omg a birthday message from @ twitterid thank you so much - i love my team at @ twitterid and jason donovan .
# bestbirthdayever
author: Matt Lee
Breakfast Producer, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: football : injury-hit player hoping for next port vale game
text: port vale midfielder michael o'connor returned from injury in the under-21 's game against stoke city at vale park last night .
having been out with a knee injury which he up during pre season , he played the first 60 minutes of the match .
o'connor told bbc radio stoke he now hopes to be part of the first team squad at southend on saturday .
it 's how it ( the knee ) reacts today but fitness wise i felt all right
author: BBC Radio Stoke Sport

documents.title: travel : delays on m6 southbound
text: three lanes of the m6 are currently blocked southbound at junction nine for wednesbury .
there are also delays southbound between at junctions 13 and 14 , near stafford .
more details on bbc travel .
officers dealing with a report of an ill driver at the wheel m6 south j9 .
3 lanes currently blocked .
expect delays .
@ twitterid ca n't you move to hard shoulder ?
just passed going northbound no reason for three lanes to be shut ?
hope the person is okay though
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 'our hearts are broken ' - family 's grief as heart attack victim loses his fight
text: the parents of teenage holidaymaker jordan burndred have paid tribute to their `` loving '' son after he lost his fight for life in turkey .
author: The Sentinel

documents.title: old bailey date for stoke man accused of terror offences
text: a stoke-on-trent man is due before the old bailey at the end of the month accused of terror offences .
syed hoque , 36 , appeared at westminster magistrates ' court earlier charged with three counts of funding terrorism - he only spoke to confirm his name .
it 's alleged he `` entered into or became concerned '' in arrangements for thousands of pounds in money and property to be used for terrorism .
the three counts are alleged to have taken place between october 2013 and april 2014 .
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: news : formaldehyde found at school and stoke terror case headed for old bailey
text: the top stories for staffordshire and cheshire
- the chemical formaldehyde has been discovered at a school in staffordshire after an investigation into a `` mystery '' smell
- a stoke-on-trent man is due before the old bailey at the end of the month
- a woman from staffordshire has been banned from driving for 2 years say police after being found guilty of causing death by careless driving
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: thousands sign hearing aid petition
text: a campaign group have handed over a petition to staffordshire county council today against cuts to hearing aids subsidies .
action on hearing loss managed to get over 5000 signatures on the petition .
they presented it to councillors this morning - staffordshire county council leader councillor philip atkins tweeted that they 've sent it on to the local clinical commissioning group .
good speech paul breckell @ twitterid meeting on hearing aid petition .
petition sent to ccg # democracyinaction
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: your bridge at staffordshire reservoir
text: a stunning from emma willetts of tittensor reservoir in staffordshire .
i 'm always trying to feature as many of your as possible - you can email them to me , tweet them or put them on instagram ( just add # bbcstoke to the description if you agree to share them ) .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: £ 1m owed in unpaid council bills
text: council chiefs are taking action in a bid to recoup more than £ 1million in unpaid bills in burton .
author: Burton Mail

documents.title: formaldehyde-affected school to stay closed
text: flash ley community primary school and nursery is expected to stay closed while more tests take place .
pupils will be educated at nearby schools chetwynd centre , tillington manor and stafford manor high .
councillor ben adams , in charge of education , says all parents are being invited to meet the team investigating the incident .
staffordshire county council said there were `` unlikely to be any long-lasting health problems '' .

documents.title: formaldehyde found at 'mystery smell ' school
text: the chemical formaldehyde has been discovered at a school in staffordshire after an investigation into a `` mystery '' smell .
about 20 pupils fell ill at flash ley community primary school and nursery in stafford , which was evacuated on friday .
it is not clear whether the illnesses are linked to the chemical found .

the county council says it is working closely with public health england and the health and safety executive ( hse ) to investigate the cause of the incident , which is believed to be linked to work carried out on floors during the summer .

documents.title: stoke city : 'we always knew we were a good side '
text: stoke skipper ryan shawcross says that his team always knew just how good they could be and simply took time to gel after their expensive summer overhaul .
after up just three points from their first six games , stoke have now won successive matches to vault up to 14th in the premier league table .
the 28-year-old defender has had to watch frustrated from the sidelines after missing the first two months of the season with a back injury .
we always knew we were a good side .
it was a case of waiting for it to gel and , once we did , we 've now shown that over the last couple of weeks .
author: Matt Sandoz
Stoke City commentator, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: weather : isolated showers
text: this afternoon , cloud will build as the day goes by - however sunny spells will remain with only a small risk of an isolated shower .
highs of 16c ( 61f ) .
then tonight , clear skies again which will see the temperatures fall to around 8c ( 46f ) with potential for mist and fog .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: cinema chain to recruit for new site in stoke-on-trent
text: the company behind a new nine-screen cinema in hanley says it will open in december and create up to 50 jobs .
cineworld is holding a recruitment day on 17 october for its new multiplex inside intu potteries shopping centre .
author: Sarah Robertson
Producer, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: woman banned from driving after man dies in crash
text: a staffordshire woman 's been banned from driving after being convicted of causing the death of a man by careless driving .
staffordshire policesay in may last year diane ball , of priam close , bradwell , was driving a green toyota when it collided with 57-year-old mick thompson 's motorcycle on bradwell lane .
he died at the scene - today after a trial at stoke-on-trent crown court , 47-year-old ball was found guilty of causing death by careless driving .
she was banned for two years and given a 26 weeks jail sentence , suspended for 18 months .
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: door knob factory closes down after making almost 10m
text: a stoke-on-trent factory which has made almost 10 million wooden door knobs is closing its doors today after nearly 30 years .
the owner of shallcross woodturning on the fenton industrial estate wants to retire , so is selling off the entire contents of his business on an auction site .
author: Terry Goodwin
News Editor, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: news : man in court on terror offences and pedestrian hit by lorry
text: the main headlines for staffordshire and cheshire this lunchtime
- a man from stoke-on-trent has appeared in court charged with three counts of funding terrorism
- a pedestrian 's been hit by a lorry on the a38 near lichfield .
- a team of seven nurses from the royal stoke university hospital are in calais treating people in migrant camps
traffic pls rt : # a38 closed near # lichfield due to serious collision northbound bet # weeford & # swinfin pls avoid area if poss
author: Lee Thomas
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: calais migrants : report from camp as stoke nurses arrive with aid
text: seven nurses from stoke-on-trent have entered one of calais 's migrant camps and been `` swamped '' by people there .
they 've come here from the royal stoke university hospital with medical aid after raising hundreds of pounds .
i 've journeyed with them and , once we arrived , we tried patiently for a while with help of some interpreters to get a queue - but then it just got to the point there were too many people .
the group are going to spend 24 hours here working with the british red cross
author: Emma Thomas
Journalist, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: action group formed in protest over moorlands planning
text: a group of people in the staffordshire moorlands have formed a group to protest against the district council 's planning department .
the aim of the moorlands united planning action group is , they say , to make sure people 's views are heard about planning issues .
staffordshire moorlands district council have told bbc radio stoke they wo n't comment for the time being .
smdc ( staffordshire moorlands district council ) have announced that they 're barring the press and the public from attending what should be open meetings .
author: Ros Chimes
Reporter, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: log burner sparks fire drama at the cheshire cat in nantwich
text: a busy restaurant and bar in nantwich had to be evacuated after the log burner filled the building with smoke !
author: Nantwich News

documents.title: darts : stoke player in 'finest ' display at world event
text: stoke-on-trent 's ian white produced one of the finest darts displays of his career to knock gary anderson out of the world grand prix yesterday .
white defied 11 scores of 180 from anderson in their four-set second round match with eight maximums .
more importantly he out-doubled the reigning world champion in both starting and finishing to claim the 3-1 win , setting up a quarter-final match tonight against mensur suljović .
author: Graham McGarry
BBC Radio Stoke Sport

documents.title: road shut after crash between lorry and pedestrian
text: a pedestrian 's been hit by a lorry on the a38 near lichfield .
staffordshire police say the northbound and southbound carriageways have been shut between weeford and swinfin .
the force says the `` serious '' collision happened on the northbound side - the south side 's shut for the air ambulance to land .
traffic pls rt : # a38 closed near # lichfield due to serious collision northbound bet # weeford & # swinfin pls avoid area if poss
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : new ice cream van unveiled after design court battle
text: crewe-based ice cream van manufacturer whitby morrison has launched its latest model following a high court battle .
# crewe ice cream van manufacturer @ twitterid has unveiled its latest design after a court battle over designs
author: Lamont Howie
Reporter, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: travel : oil spillage on cheshire road
text: warning of an oil spill on the a500 from cheshire police on twitter .
@ twitterid taking reports of a large diesel spill on the a500 stoke bound , junc cheerbrook round-a-bout # nantwich .
approach with care .

documents.title: breakingstoke man in court charged with terror offences
text: a man from stoke-on-trent has appeared in court charged with three counts of funding terrorism .
it 's alleged syed hoque , 36 , `` entered into or became concerned '' in arrangements for thousands of pounds in money and property to be used for terrorism .
he will next appear at the old bailey on 30 october .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your large vegetable sighting in staffordshiretweet @ twitterid
text: the you send in come in all shapes and sizes , including this one on instagram from claudialovescats of a `` giant marrow in leek '' .
like claudia you can put your photos on instagram to share with us ( just add # bbcstoke to the description if you agree to share them ) .
or you can email or tweet them to @ twitterid and i 'll feature as many as i can on the stoke and staffordshire live page .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football club to remember teen player who died this week
text: leek town football club will hold a minute 's silence before this saturday 's game in memory of a junior footballer .
seventeen-year-old jordan burndred from biddulph died yesterday after suffering multiple heart attacks while on holiday in turkey .
jordan 's mother , nicola everill , broke the news through social media and thanked everyone for their support .
it 's sent shock waves through the football in general , i 've had texts and messages sent to me from all clubs in the northern premier league .
author: Lee Blakeman
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: on-air : talking about cheating on a partner and what you 'd do
text: morning .
last night the bbc one drama doctor foster came to an end - and it got me thinking about cheating and what you 'd do if you knew in real life .
in the tv show , a trusted gp sees her charmed life explode when she suspects her husband of an affair .
so i want to know , if your friend was cheating and you knew , would you say anything ?
you can email or tweet @ twitterid
author: Perry Spiller
Presenter, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: burton patient forced to move doctors surgeries after 62 years
text: a patient from burton who has been with the same doctors surgery for 62 years has been forced to leave - along with around 70 other people .
author: Burton Mail

documents.title: news : calais migrants treated by stoke nurses and stoke city captain returns from injury
text: staffordshire and cheshire 's top stories :
- seven nurses from stoke-on-trent have arrived in calais where they 'll help to treat refugees
- a group of people in the staffordshire moorlands have formed a group to protest against the district council 's planning department
- the stoke city captain ryan shawcross has made his return from injury after several months out
author: Lee Blakeman
Newsreader, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: your comments : baking up a storm in the kitchen
text: this cake was baked by my co-host charlotte foster last night as it 's her birthday today - she 's claiming to be about 28 !
so , given it was also the final of the great british bake off yesterday , i want to know - what 's the last thing you baked and why ?
you can email your comments or put them on the bbc radio stoke facebook page .
author: Stuart George
Presenter, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: football : stoke city captain returns from injury
text: the stoke city captain ryan shawcross made his return from injury in last night 's under-21 's game at port vale .
he 's been out with a back injury since july and played in the first half at vale park .
shawcross told bbc radio stoke he 's now looking forward to playing alongside some of the club 's summer signings in the first team .
i do n't think shaqiri knows who i am so it 'd be nice to show him i actually play football .
author: Matt Sandoz
Stoke City commentator, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: nurses head from stoke to help calais migrants
text: a team of nurses from stoke-on-trent is travelling to calais this morning , to help patients at the migrant camps .
the group 's raised hundreds of pounds to take medical aid to france , where they will spend 24 hours working with the british red cross .
the nurses are all based at the royal stoke university hospital .
midlands today will have more on this story if you get your tv from birmingham on our lunchtime update from 13:30 on bbc one .
author: BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: nantwich youngsters help town 's declining hedgehogs
text: youngsters in nantwich are teaming up to help save the town 's declining hedgehog population .
author: Nantwich News

documents.title: your mooning around in staffordshire
text: want to know what the moon looked like this morning ?
well duncan richardson was up in the staffordshire area and sent us this great photo .
if you 've got a good from across staffordshire or cheshire you want to share , like duncan you can tweet it to @ twitterid or send it me on email .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

text: stoke city 's club captain ryan shawcross made his playing return from injury last night in an under-21 match - and his wife showed her delight after the game on social media .
`` @ stokecity : guess who 's back ryan shawcross skippers the development squad .
# scfc
@ twitterid @ twitterid captain fantastic
@ twitterid @ twitterid get are captain back and lead us to glory

text: a cold and clear start to the day with plenty of sunshine for most .
cloud will build as the day goes by however sunny spells will remain with only a small risk of an isolated shower .
highs of 16c ( 61f ) .

documents.title: travel : slow moving on m6 in part of staffordshire
text: there 's stop-start traffic on the m6 southbound in staffordshire between junctions 10a and 9 , in the roadworks area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: stoke and staffordshire live : welcome to thursday
text: morning everyone , it 's a brighter start to the day than yesterday in stoke-on-trent as this taken ( safely ) on potteries way in hanley shows .
we 'll have a full weather update shortly from charlie slater and the team will also today be bringing you the latest news , sport , travel and more - including sent in by you .
you can drop any photos you want to share with me on email , tweet @ twitterid or put them on instagram ( just add # bbcstoke to the description if you agree to share them ) .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live
